metadata.title: CVE-2022-3435 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in Linux Kernel.This affects the function fib_nh_match of the file net/ipv4/fib_semantics.cof the component IPv4 Handler. The manipulation leads to out-of-boundsread. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. It is recommended toapply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-210357 was assigned tothis vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3435` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic-lpae - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic-64k - 6.1.0-16.16
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-gcp - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1001-ibm - 6.2.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1003.3
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-oracle - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi - 6.2.0-1004.5
linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi-nolpae - 6.2.0-1004.5
No subscription required
